成分: THE EMPIRICAL FORMULA OF TYLOSIN TARTRATE IS (C46H77NO17)2.C4H6O6.CARRY OUT THE METHOD FOR HPLC. THE CONTENT OF TYLOSIN A IN THESUBSTANCE BEING EXAMINED IS NOT LESS THAN 80%. CARRY OUT THEBIOLOGICAL ASSAY OF ANTIBIOTICS, THE UPPER FIDUCIAL LIMIT OF ERRORIS NOT LESS THAN 800 UNITS PER MG. CALCULATED WITH REFERENCETO THE DRIED SUBSTANCE.
